alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Muscatine; Washington (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 3:20PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms producing heavy rain will impact portions of southeastern Johnson, northeastern Washington and northwestern Muscatine Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 319 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms producing heavy rain along a line extending from near Lone Tree to near Atalissa. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Heavy rain, hail to the size of peas, and minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding of Strong thunderstorms will be near... low lying areas.. Other locations in the path of these storms include Riverside. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
